dcterms:creator: Richard Sutton
Andrew Barto
dcterms:description: The Mountain Car Problem is an environment where the goal is to drive up a mountain with a car that has insufficient power to accelerate directly. The agent receives a reward of -1 for every frame until it reaches the top, making it a challenging task for reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Mountain Car Problem

dcterms:description: Atari Breakout is a classic arcade game where the player controls a paddle to bounce a ball and break bricks. It serves as a benchmark for evaluating reinforcement learning algorithms, particularly in terms of learning from sparse rewards.
dcterms:title: Atari Breakout

dcterms:creator: Matteo Hessel
Joseph Modayil
Hado van Hasselt
Tom Schaul
Georg Ostrovski
Will Dabney
Dan Horgan
Bilal Piot
Mohammad Azar
David Silver
dcterms:description: Rainbow is a deep reinforcement learning architecture that combines several improvements over previous methods to enhance learning efficiency and performance in various environments.
dcterms:title: Rainbow
